item.title: The art of avoiding nested code
item.description: Today’s article is about nested code and how to avoid it. Why we should try to avoid nested code? Well the answer is inside your heart, and in your Python interpreter… Start your REPL and write: 1>>> import this you will get the “Zen Of Python” by Tim Peters. The Zen of Python, by Tim Peters Beautiful is better than ugly. Explicit is better than implicit. Simple is better than complex.
